HostWebis offers superior, reliable, and affordable Web Hosting to individuals and small businesses in more than 20 countries.

In order to test our new order system on our website and give LET users a chance to know us better, we are offering 1-month reseller hosting for only 4,99€ with same price renewal.

Package WHM Reseller Hosting: Reseller Hosting - Basic

Special LET Basic Reseller Hosting Package Specification:
Disk Space: 30GB SSD
Data Transfer: 200 GB
Domains: 5
Email boxes: No Limit 
Free Setup
MySQL Database: 5
PHP 7.4 Support
Webmail
Control Panel
Included 24x7 Support by ticket, online chat or email.


Order link: https://www.hostwebis.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=7
Coupon code for 1-month reseller hosting for 4,99€: LETStartResellingNow

This promotion will end on July 11.
